title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 492.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 492.1 - Scope

State Regulations
(a) This Part
establishes requirements for the operation of day programs for nonresidents of
adult homes, residences for adults and enriched housing programs. (b) Parts 485, 486, 487, 488 and 490 of this

Title apply to this Part except as specifically limited. For the purposes of
this Part all applicable references to "resident" in Parts 485, 486, 487, 488
and 490 include residents and participants in day programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
492.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
